marklogic.body:
You know, I wondered about not being Burned alive too! Like, it made me think of a Phoenix. I wonder if she's part Daemonfeuer, and part Pheonix or something. She'll probably be back for the "Dirty Dozen" ep that the EPs promised was coming.Â
I was legit scared when Wu got sprayed with that crap. I love him too much to tolerate them taking him away from me.Â
Also, word on the show hate, haha. Have you read the one recap of "Glee" that I did a few weeks back? Utter hate storm. Shows take heed: if I love you, I will Shout it from the rooftops. And if I hate you, I don't give a second thought to unleashing my fat spray and lighting fire to your ass ;)
